Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
-- This program set some dates in table GNRL to the GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE
-- if all programs completed their work,
20.03.2014 SH SCR18789 Step5: Added update CDTI_MAXFINANCECLIENT
19.02.2014 SH SCR18729 Step5: Removed updated CDTI_MAXFINANCETOTAL = 999999999 if CLNT403_MAXFINANCETOTAL = 0
11.11.2013 GB SCR18510 Added Step 6 Store CLIENT_MONTH_DAY for non working days
03.07.2013 SH SCR18248 Added step 5 PrepareInvoiceBuying
03.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
28.12.2008 GB SCR14266 Removed step 4
11.04.2008 SH SCR13505 Step5 Fixed bug with use of old/new GNRL_ACTIVEDATE, has
to be always the new GNRL_ACTIVEDATE
10.12.2007 SH SCR13186 Added step5 "Change date temporary bookings"
17.10.2007 GB SCR12994 Step 4: Store BANK_MONTH_DAY rows for the new working day
changed link create on link write
23.03.2007 SH SCR12361 Added step 4
10.03.2005 MW SCR#7908 --> Extended the selection of CMON
01.09.2004 EE SCR#4538 changed check of existing rows
05.07.2004 EE SCR#4538 reconstruction
10.03.2005 MW SCR#7908 --> Extended the sql-expression
-- Set CDTI_CURRBALGUARANTEES
-- Set CDTI_MAXFINANCETOTAL
-- Set CDTI_MAXFINANCECLIENT

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ADMNO = :2 and CDEP_CLNTNO = :3 and CDEP_TYPE in (1,6,7) for fetch only
